title: Is there an ida plugin that disassemble in visual c inline assembly (visual studio)?
content: I have a question... Is there an ida plugin that disassemble the file in visual studio inline assembly? I found this https://github.com/binrapt/ida but when I load it in ida, it complains about "No module named nil.file"... Where can I find this "nil.file"? I searched in the web but I can't find anything ahah

comments.text: your question is unclear... what specifically you want to achieve?

answers_data.content:
this imho is not a plugin it is python script possibly to be used with idapython it list nil as a module to be imported so you may need to install it just gave a search with pip and i get 
C:\>pip search nil
nil (0.2.0)  - CMGS cOde ToOls
so do 
C:\>pip install nil
